name: ♬ Harmony Dungeon ♪
description:
Play as a cute bard and use music to move things around!

Thank you for playing!! Please rate us!

//

How to play:

  • Arrow keys ~ Move yourself or platforms;
  • 1 - 5 ~ Musical skills! Try them and discover what they do!
  • Restart button (top right) ~ Restart level;

//

Known Bugs for Jam Build:

  • Restart button is not working at some levels;
  • Platform movement can be buggy at times, if it doesn't go back to normal, please try restarting the level;
  • At level 5, it is not possible to proceed to level 6;
  • The bugs above have been fixed in the Fixed Build. No more green platforms stuck here!

//
